resources.string: API Key is missing. Please configure it.
A note on using the generator…
Before we begin, we will need to get you an Google Gemini API key.
Tap the link in this message. From there, tap ≡ > Get API Key > Create API Key > Create API Key in New Project. Copy the key.
Paste the API Key into here.
You\'re good to go! If you need to see these options again, you can click this button to show and hide them.

The generator uses Google's Gemini AI to generate study guides and flash cards. While AI can be an excellent tool for this kind of task, it should also be used with care.

In particular, the AI can generate flashcards and guides that have:

- Inaccurate/Misleading Information
- Offensive Content
- Biased Information
- Outdated Content

It is advised to supplement use of this application with other study materials to ensure accuracy.

The application is made to use Gemini's free-tier. If you are a developer with other Gemini API keys, please follow every step of the instructions after this notice anyway, including the creation of a new project and API key. This will prevent mishaps with rate limits and billed usage.
Please note that generating study guides, especially big ones, can take a little while, roughly 2–3 sections per minute.
Welcome to Conor\'s Study Assistant! Let\'s guide you through the basic operations!
Click here to generate a new quiz or study guide based on a topic!
Once you are done generating, click here to load it!
You\'re all set to begin studying!
Start by generating a quiz or study guide here:
Note: You can get an API key at https://aistudio.google.com/. From there, click on ≡ > Get API Key > Create API Key > Create API Key in New Project.
API Key field is visible but empty.
Your study guide is being made! It may take a little while, especially for a bigger one. Please be patient! Stay on this page until prompted to save!
Your flashcards are being made! It may take a minute or two, please be patient! Stay on this page until prompted to save!
